Description:
Location! Location! Location!!
Literally a stones throw from the heart of Emerald, this comfortable 3 bedroom/1 bathroom brick home is freshly painted & ready for you to move in & enjoy the convenience of walking to town.
The home has zoned bedrooms with the spacious, robed Master at one end and 2 further robed bedrooms and the family bathroom at the other end of the open plan living, dining and kitchen space.
There is a toasty wood heater to keep you warm in winter and a split system for hassle free, year-round comfort.
Add to this external shutters for privacy and security, and outside there is a lovely, private, undercover deck for entertaining surrounded by lush established gardens.
Situated on a flat, corner block, just over 1/3 of an acre this property is fully fenced and has 3 sheds with concrete floor to take care of your cars and workshop needs.
Opportunities like this, perfect as a first home, a downsize or an investment, in such a great location dont come along very often, so make sure this one is on your must-see list!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Unique Home on a Flat 1700m2 Block With Permit for a Large Shed
***PRIVATE INSPECTIONS CAN BE BOOKED FOR THIS PROPERTY***
Nothing quite soothes the soul like a mudbrick home, they have a certain ambience and the craftsmanship. This home exudes both comfort and the WOW factor! The floor to ceiling windows with amazing garden vistas, the exposed beams, the mezzanine main bedroom all combine to impress. Seasonally youll enjoy the natural light that floods through the living spaces and the useability of the versatile floorplan. Showcasing: 3 bedrooms, the main with WIR, enclosed front porch, well-appointed kitchen with SS appliances, dining and huge living spaces, one a retreat to the main, a large bathroom with bath and shower, external mud brick laundry room, 3 driveways, permits for a 9x9m shed with 3m high doors, new fencing and automated gates, plenty of off street parking and solar. The grounds are beautifully landscaped, lush lawns, ferns on an allotment of just over 1700m2. The location is great, just minutes to Emerald or Monbulk Townships, schools and shops. This property is sure to move you emotionally, prepare to fall in love at 122 Emerald Monbulk Road in Emerald.
Please call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 to arrange and inspection.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing.
With the COVID 19 outbreak, the health and wellbeing of our clients and staff is our highest priority.
We are all taking extra measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus. Please help us by respecting our request that you do not attend an Inspection or the office if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you practice social distancing from anyone attending the office or at a private inspection, and where possible refrain from touching surfaces. We also appreciate your understanding as we are only able to have one person view the interior of the property at a time, therefore couples will be able to look at the home individually with the agent present.
Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
THE LOCATION IS PERFECT & THE SIZE WILL SURPRISE!!!
***PLEASE CALL THE AGENT TO BOOK A PRIVATE VIEWING***
This is the ideal opportunity to enter the property market, extend your investment portfolio or move in close to town & enjoy all the conveniences right at your doorstep!! Located in a great position with sealed road access, this brick home offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a beautiful galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher plus there is polished floorboards, modern blinds & perfect colour tones throughout. Boasting 2 separate living areas which include a large lounge with dining area plus another living room ideal as a parents retreat or kids play zone. Split system heating & cooling plus a wood fire ensures year round comfort plus the solar power, solar hot water service & water tanks guarantees cost effective living. Set on 1672m2 (approx.) this elevated position enjoys plenty of sun & a lovely outlook over the garden & greenery that surrounds. Walking distance to town, transport, childcare, community hall, brand new playground & school - this home will be the best decision you make to start living your country dream now!

Description:
Land 3670m2 (approx) with Building Permit Approved
Finding land that you can actually build on is getting harder and harder, especially in the hills. Here we have just under an acre with all the planning work complete.
Planning permits have been granted to build a cutting-edge, architecturally designed single storey split level hills retreat; which uses the lay of the land to its advantage. With the main entrance on Boundary Road and a pedestrian access point on Mimosa Avenue; this innovative opportunity is builder ready.
Dual Access Property
Opens onto Wrights Forest and walking tracks
All Services Available - Gas, Electricity, Sewer, Water & NBN
Architect designed, plans & building available to negotiate
BMS & Arborists Report
CFA Advice
Energy Report
Engineering Review
Soil Test
Call Katie on 0428 744 498 for more info...

Description:
Natural Beauty Shines amongst the Ferns
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE ADHERING TO HYGIENE & SOCIAL DISTANCING GUIDELINES
On a magical bush block alive with ferns and plants buzzing with bees, you will find this enchanting mudbrick waiting to begin a new story. A home harmoniously connected with the earth, showcasing a wealth of glorious timbers - Oregon beams, Cypress posts and Tasmanian oak floors.
The master bedroom sits loftily on the mezzanine, a tranquil retreat with a split system, matching walk-in robes and plenty of space for you to unfurlinto a reading nook, a meditation zone or into downward facing dog. The further 2 bedrooms are spacious with BIR and views to the setting sun.
The house has a rustic feel and modernity where needed - in the kitchen, you will find a Smeg hob and oven and an expansive butler's pantry boasting enough room for an abundance of appliances. The adjoining living is heated by a wood-fire and has a soaring vaulted ceiling creating a welcoming space to relax and feel content.
The bathroom has been tastefully renovated with large french doors allowing you to bathe in nature.
Storage is no problem in the laundry nor in the double garage which has a secret workshop with built-in cupboards and drawers and miniature train tracks! The garden is fully fenced and houses a 2100 litre water tank, garden and woodshed and you can hand feed the King Parrots when you nip out to collect the lemons and limes.
Insights: 36 Fernglade Drive, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 34 other 3 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
LUXE LIVING ON LAKESIDE
(16m x 7.5m Extra Heavy Duty Big G Ranbuild Shed included)
Behind a glorious hedge of ornamental pears on the high side of this extremely popular heritage area of Emerald, rests this weatherboard family home, freshly renovated with a luxe finish.
The cavernous shed is ready for the largest project with 3 motorised roller doors and its own power. Heaps of off-street parking and room to manoeuvre trailers, boats and caravans.
The impeccably designed and presented master suite is discreetly positioned to offer you privacy and serenity from the hustle-bustle of family life. Wake up with the sun glowing through the french doors, consider your outfit in the walk-in robe then take time to bathe in the luxurious ensuite with; matching sinks, floor to ceiling tiles, inviting bath and spacious shower.
The bright, white glamorous kitchen has glass splash-backs, Caesarstone benchtops, Smeg 900mm oven & Miele dishwasher, a blackboard wall and an icemaking double-sized fridge included. All perfectly finished with a chandelier over the island bench.
The Tasmanian oak solid flooring in the living and dining areas adds further elegance to this home where you dine looking across the hills and sit warmed by a central wood fireplace in the lovely comfortable lounge. The family bathroom is perfectly polished with sunken bath and the 2 further bedrooms with BIR are soothing and restful.
The Shed Specs
16.045m x 7.5m
Big G Ranbuild Shed (Extra Heavy Duty)
Category 4 Cyclone Rated
Motorised Roller Doors x 3
Roof Ventilation x 2
5.2m Roof Centre
4.0 x 3.6m Roller Doors
125mm Concrete Slab
2 x Bays Epoxy Coated + 2 x Bays Burnished Concrete
Separate Power Supply to Shed
8 x Double Fluoros (2 x switches)
2 x CAT6 Cables from House (Network/Alarm/Cameras)
1 x Telephone Line from House
Independent Stormwater Drain to Shed
15amp Power Point
4 x Double 10amp Power Points
Electrical Board in Shed
Sold?
The hard work to fully terrace the garden has been completed and features wastewater treatment that is used to irrigate the garden. Lovely mass plantings of roses and hedges are growing happily.

Description:
ALMOST TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE - BLISSFUL 10 ACRES
***PLEASE CALL THE AGENT TO BOOK A PRIVATE VIEWING***
There is nothing to do here but move in and enjoy this perfectly presented property that offers an unrivalled lifestyle for the whole family. The home features display home style with modern tones and the latest fittings and fixtures. Large windows provide stunning views from all angles which can also be enjoyed from the wrap around verandahs. The updated kitchen boasts Caesarstone benches, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and inset sink and adjoins the large open plan living area which has a 'Blaze' wood fire as a centrepiece and triple stack doors that lead out to the outdoor entertainment area providing the best in indoor/outdoor living. There are four bedrooms; at each end of the home are bedrooms with their own ensuite facilities and the two remaining bedrooms are serviced by the third bathroom. Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, Bamboo flooring and floor to ceiling tiling. Outdoors is a delight whether you want to hone your equestrian skills on the 50 x 25 ménage, spend time with your four legged friends in the paddocks or tinker in the American style barn. There is an additional 5 bay carport, hay shelter and storage area. Imagine laying back in the solar heated, salt chlorinated infinity pool whilst you take in the views or of an evening you can watch the stars while you unwind. The 'man cave' is the ideal place to get away from it all and comes complete with a solid fuel fire and a sink and would also make a great teenagers pad or work from home space. Situated in the heart of Macclesfield with sealed road access and a short trot to the local Pony Club, this is a property that caters to the needs of every member of the family and will make you the envy of all.

Description:
OVER 14 ACRES OF PEACEFUL BUSH SETTING
** VIEWING BY APPOINTMENT ONLY**
Please contact the Agent via phone, sms or email to book your private viewing.
Situated on over 14 acres of land, this mostly tree'd peaceful block brings a world of possibilities for anyone looking to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday living. Only a short drive from the popular Emerald Village and with easy access to Princes Hwy, this is a perfect lifestyle opportunity. There is a driveway already in place and some cleared areas of land All you need is your plans and permits (STCA) and you will be ready to build your amazing dream home.
For more information on about beautiful block, contact us today.

Description:
Peace, perfection and silver birches
A perfect hobby farm on a manageable 2.5 acres (approx.) with 3 open paddocks bordered by bushland on one side. The Yarra Valley stretches at the feet of this utterly charming home set within a beautiful cottage garden, with an epic shed, and a dual access driveway.
You are welcomed into the house via a gorgeous alfresco entertaining area with divine views out onto the Yarra Ranges with the scent of the climbing roses in the air. Passing the Castlemaine stone chimney you enter into the convivial country kitchen with farmhouse sink, stone bench and top-end appliances with other necessities discreetly hidden in the large utility/butler's pantry.
The wraparound verandah which offers a light and airy feel to all of the downstairs rooms; French doors open from the kitchen, the spacious lounge/dining room, the study and the master with large wardrobes and ensuite. This home exudes character with its rendered walls, hardwood floors, and vintage glass doors. It is warmed by a large wood-fired heater and ducted heating and cooled by split systems.
Proceeding upstairs you find three spacious double rooms with BIR. The largest has a patio entrance which could be used as a business entrance if required. The large family bathroom hosts a double shower and bath.
It is close to off-grid with ample tank water and a 4KW solar system giving you ample off-set against those pesky bills.
This house has a rare beauty, you do not want to miss it!
Insights: 175 Beenak Road, Gembrook VIC 3783 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
RENOVATED HOME, MASSIVE SHED ON ALMOST 1 ACRE
Due to the current need for social distancing, it would be advisable to arrange a private viewing of this property with our Agency.
Here it is a perfect, flat 1acre (approx) block with great shedding that is ideal for a tradesperson requiring loads of vehicle storage and workshop or for those with lots of toys to store. The home has been freshly renovated with an exciting modern take on a 50s diner style kitchen featuring a large vintage style belling oven, island bench and loads of cupboards. There is a butlers pantry equipped with a dishwasher, second sink and an abundance of storage and bench space that makes creating a culinary feast a breeze. An open plan living area flows off from the kitchen allowing plenty of space for entertaining or relaxing by the gas log fire. There are 3 bedrooms including a lavish master suite complete with walk in robe and stylishly renovated ensuite with double vanities. The freshly renovated main bathroom has a spa and is located next to the 2nd and 3rd bedroom and an open study caters for a home office or homework area. The home offers designer style including plantation shutters and the latest colour scheme, 5kw solar system to assist with your bills and help the environment and ducted refrigerated heating and cooling for year round comfort. Outdoors offers excellent access for a variety of vehicles, a huge 20 x 6 shed with 4 roller doors and workshop, 2 car carport and colourful established gardens. All of this is just a short walk to the Secondary College, General Store and renowned restaurant. Bus at the door and sporting facilities across the road ensure that this is a property that will cater to your every need.

Visit: http://www.barryplant.com.au/media-hub/resources for the Information.
We can provide alternatives to meeting in person and for inspections, please contact us to find out what options are available to you.

Description:
SOPHISTICATED AND SUSTAINABLE LIFESTYLE
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE
Stealing the show of the superbly renovated family home is the truly sumptuous front Merbau covered decking which runs the full length of the house and takes in the glorious view. This magnificent space delivers the lifestyle you have been searching for before you have even crossed the threshold.
Entering this flawless solid brick home with fresh paint, new carpets and hardwood floating floor there is a feeling of a return to self. The formal living area boasts an open fireplace and a reading nook kissed by morning sunshine. The open plan kitchen/living area is ready for your family to enjoy with double-sized oven and fridge space, plus Caesarstone benches. The large windows look out to the fully fenced back garden, covered patio, swings, sandpit, firepit and woodshed with vehicle access.
The beautiful master suite has a bay window with box seat, walk-in wardrobe and gleaming ensuite with frameless shower and door to the garden. A further two bright bedrooms are double with BIR. The 4th bedroom is currently a playroom but would make an excellent study. The family bathroom with deep bath and the laundry have been perfectly matched to create a seamless look throughout.
Sustainable features are packed into the ¾ of an acre. This is the future of living; sunny vegetable beds, an orchard with apples, plums, lemon and apricots, a 33,500-litre water tank plus mains access, a 5kwh solar system with 20 solar panels and a solar water heater with a gas booster. Not to forget the chicken run, 2 bay compost system and potting area.
Other features include; a double garage with its own mudroom shower, sealed driveway and native garden, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
This family-friendly pocket of Emerald welcomes you to the neighbourhood.

Description:
Outstanding Return!
**PLEASE CONTACT AGENT DIRECTLY TO BOOK YOUR PRIVATE VIEWING**
This is an ideal investment opportunity right in the heart of beautiful Gembrook!
The main home has two bedrooms, both with built in robes and new carpet, large living area, private rear yard and a single lock up garage. The lush front garden is filled with established trees providing a wonderful privacy screen from the street.
The property is currently tenanted and generating $2,925 per calendar month.
Located just a short 70 meters from the centre of Gembrook, the location of this property is conveniently close to all amenities - shops, cafes, restaurants, parklands, school, preschool and the iconic Puffing Billy station. Why not take advantage of this amazing property location while enjoying the financial benefit.
Perfect for new home buyers or for the astute investor. Planning zone is NRZ1.

Description:
10 Stunning Acres, Views, Mains Water, Sealed Road & Dual Accom In The Heart Of Macclesfield!
**THIS PROPERTY IS CURRENTLY UNDER CONTRACT - NO INSPECTIONS**
Being offered for the first time in 47 years is this stunning 10 acres with a well-loved family home, perfectly located with sought after sealed road frontage in the heart of Macclesfield. This home has a self contained unit under the home roof line making this an ideal dual accommodation residence. Across the road from Macclesfield Primary School and short distance to Macclesfield Pony Club, Emerald & Monbulk townships, this homes location is perfect for any sized family. This property has too many features to mention and must be seen to be appreciated.
Some of the features include:
Circular concrete driveway and 5 gated road access entries - remote gates to the 4 car carport
Secure atrium entry hall and security cameras throughout
Four bedrooms all with built in robes - Master with walk in robe & semi-ensuite
Formal lounge with built in refrigerated bar & French doors opening onto the rear patio
Dining room with built in Blackwood cabinetry & air conditioner
Country style kitchen with Blackwood cabinetry, walk in pantry & cosy wood fire heater
Study with built in desk, Blackwood cabinets & split system
TV room/Snug with wood fire and door access to covered pool area
Glass enclosed rear patio with distant views to the Warburton ranges
Motorised external shutters throughout
Solar panels - 2kw of solar power
Back up generator connected to home in case of a power outage
Separate large games room ideal as a billiard room, with storage, seating and heating
Large covered in-ground, solar heated pool complete with built in BBQ & seating area
Self contained accommodation with private access, open plan kitchen/living area with stunning views, large bathroom with laundry option and paved and fenced rear yard with clothes line
Extensive landscaped gardens full of flowering shrubs and mature trees
Automatic irrigation system fed from dam to garden and orchard featuring orange, lemon, grapefruit & mandarin
Huge vegetable garden
10 glorious near flat, well fenced acres, ideal for horse enthusiasts
5 good sized paddocks all with water
Horse shelters in paddock, hay shed & mini-stable
Multiple shedding for tools, machinery, etc with huge workshop + a 4 car garage
Stunning dam
Tank water in use and mains water connected
This property has beautiful land, great facilities and amazing location this combination is a must see for the serious buyer!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
READY TO WELCOME YOU HOME ON OVER ½ AN ACRE!
***PLEASE CALL THE AGENT TO BOOK A PRIVATE VIEWING***
This is a home that says welcome from the moment you step inside! Beautifully presented & with sunlight streaming through the windows you can immediately relax & let go of your busy lifestyle. The lounge room enjoys a lovely leafy outlook & the separate dining/family room allows plenty of space to enjoy a meal together. From here you have direct access to the large outdoor covered entertaining area where plenty of good times & privacy are assured! Special features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, polished floor boards & a timber kitchen. All services are connected plus the bonus of solar electricity and two large water tanks, a massive 14m X 6m (approx.) garage with concrete floor and power that is perfectly suited to a car enthusiast or tradesman. Set on a beautiful allotment of over 1/2 an acre is this fantastic property that is perfectly suited for those who want to experience what living in the hills is all about. Call us & inspect today!

Description:
DREAM IT! BUILD IT! LIVE IT!
Always dreamt of finding that PERFECT parcel of land and building the dream home, designed exactly how you want it? This sun-drenched, elevated and completely clear allotment of just over 1000m2 is within a Neighbourhood Residential Zone and features picturesque views of the scenic Dandenong Ranges. Within walking distance to Emerald Township, bus connections, schools, shops, the Community Hub, library, sporting clubs, cafes and restaurants the position is exemplary. The rest is up to you, engage your creative energies and build your dream (subject to council approval). Once youve built it, you can live it. Lots like this don't come around often, there is literally NOTHING else like it. A lifestyle in a picturesque setting, in a beautiful town, who could ask for more?
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to find out more.
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing.
With the COVID 19 outbreak, the health and wellbeing of our clients and staff is our highest priority.
We are all taking extra measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus. Please help us by respecting our request that you do not attend an Inspection or the office if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you practice social distancing from anyone attending the office or at an inspection, and where possible refrain from touching surfaces. We also appreciate your understanding as we are only able to have 10 people view the interior of the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding

Description:
LOVE LIVING LOCAL
*Inspection available by Private Appointment*
From this quiet, central pocket of Emerald you can enjoy having everything in walking distance. Whether you are taking the kids to the excellent local primary or walking the dog to get a sneaky pastry at the bakery, this is the home to offer you a more relaxed lifestyle.
THE MAIN HOUSE shines bright with its sensational indoor/outdoor living area ready to entertain all of your nearest and dearest. Bi-fold doors open to the enormous decked and covered alfresco area, replete with crackling open fire. The kitchen located in the light, large and airy living space has been thoughtfully and tastefully remodelled with white Caesarstone, pendulum lights and a sensational servery hatch that opens the kitchen to the party or the sun.
This lovely home also hosts; three comfortable bedrooms with BIR, family bathroom, laundry, Tasmanian Oak flooring, ducted heating & evaporative air conditioning. The solid double garage has 15 amp power, concrete floor and automatic doors and there is also under house storage and power.
The garden has been screened from the neighbours by flowering bushes and features lemons, mandarins and rather impressively an avocado tree that is a productive fruiter. The fertile vegetable patch is happily watered by the 10,000 litre water tank.
THE STUDIO with its own private patio is a completely self contained little stunner. It has a gorgeous contemporary bathroom, kitchen with glass splashbacks, room to unwind, no stairs and its own split system!
With so much on offer in this perfect position do not miss the opportunity to live close in.

Description:
Luxe Styling Contemporary Living Entertainment Loving
Seamlessly designed for modish living in style and with ease, this young brick home is centrally situated on a beautiful private and peaceful 1 acre block with views towards the hills of Emerald township.
A sophisticated palette of black and white flows in from the exterior and throughout this well-appointment family lifestyle property. A sleek kitchen with a black stone benchtop, splashback, and stainless steel appliances is the command centre for entertaining in the sensational open-plan living with a stunning vaulted ceiling. This is a room with a view. Expansive enough to dine looking out to the horizon and spontaneous beers around the pool table yet can convert to quiet cosy nights and conversations on the sofa. On a warm evening with drinks and cheese, spill outdoors under the shade sails and amongst the native bush landscaping. For movie night, retreat to the home cinema/gaming room - wired for sound with acoustic paneling and a stellar silver screen.
As with everything in this house, the bedrooms and study are generous and immaculate. The master suite is particularly spacious with a walk-in robe and elegant ensuite. A 4th bedroom/nursery or study has symmetrical double doors that match opposite the master. 2 further bedrooms are large and bright with built-in robes. A pristine family bathroom completes.
The huge garage accessed through the laundry doubles as a fantastic workshop with natural light and power.
All the practicalities are provided; there is wood-fired heating with heat transfer system circulating warmth through the house, an economical heat sink hot water system, a split system, dual access block, a 20,000-litre water tank, garden shed, woodshed and a treatment plant that recycles wastewater for use in the garden.
Prioritise the lifestyle you want.
Internal area
278m²

Description:
Pretty As A Picture!
Youll love this pretty double storey home which greets you as you drive through the front gates.
Situated on an elevated position on a large 1673 sqm block, this home takes in the beautiful surrounding country views and provides the outdoor space a growing family loves.
The home has an open plan living with kitchen, meals and lounge combined. Large windows allow the natural light to flood in while ensuring uninterrupted views of the garden and surrounding countryside. A sliding timber and glass barn door connects the well-appointed kitchen with a spacious utilities room, laundry and downstairs bathroom.
Upstairs the pitched ceilings adds charm to the three bedrooms, study area and bathroom on this level. Juliette balconies in the Master and one other bedroom allows you to enjoy the views out to the surrounding tranquil views.
Climate comfort will be assured all year round with gas ducted heating, split system and a contemporary electric log fireplace.
For that extra space, downstairs there is also a room with external access, perfect as an office or kids retreat.
From the living area glass doors open out to the north facing entertaining deck where you can simply relax with your favourite drink enjoying the views while overlooking the large yard where kids and pets can play safely all day. If you need some extra me-time relax in the outdoor spa and feel the stresses of the day fall away.
Fully fenced, the generous yard also features a double carport, large storage room, garden shed, kids playground and dog or chicken enclosure. With low maintenance landscaped gardens you will have more free time to stroll into Gembrook to meet up with friends for brunch or enjoy a scenic summer walk with the family to local parklands.
Inspect today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
4 BEDS + Acreage in Superb Location!
A superb opportunity exists to make your lifestyle dreams come true. Positioned on 7.09 Ha of virtually flat land, this impressive family residence offers both privacy and convenience.
Just a short drive to local schools, shops and restaurants, the home features 4 good sized bedrooms with built in robes and master with ensuite. The remaining bedrooms are conveniently serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
The large living and adjoining meals area features reverse cycle split system and ceiling fan for those warm summer evenings and double glass doors open to a substantial timber deck, overlooking the dam and offering an ideal place to entertain or relax. The ample kitchen with electric oven, gas cooktop and appliance cupboard looks over the deck, and a wood heater creates an inviting atmosphere indoors for cooking hearty meals during the cooler months.
Outdoors, there is considerable car accommodation with a generous double carport and lock up garage, and a separate additional carport.
Set on just under 18 acres, the property is divided into 7 easily accessible paddocks, all with pumped water available from the spring fed dam, making it perfect for livestock. The property also comprises 2 supplementary double garages with power for farm machinery or storage, and additional garden shed.
Properties like this do not come along often.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
WOW!!! AMAZING BLOCK IN THE HEART OF EMERALD
Opportunitys like this are rare, especially considering the proximity to the main shopping Village of Emerald only a 3-minute drive; the size of land being well over ½ acre and two road frontages including Kilvington Drive and Rawhiti Road. The Character Cottage sits proudly on the land and is complimented by a separate Studio, Carport and Garden Shed. You may be searching for the perfect block to build your dream home or even a first home buyer to enter the market with future development in mind STCA. Whatever your reasoning I encourage those with a curious mind to inspect early as this one wont last long. Call Rebecca Halit today.
Insights: 73 Kilvington Drive, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.
